function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in FIDs in LNG industry leading to economic impact","Impact":"Reduction in revenue and potential bankruptcy of producers","Mitigation":"Diversification into clean energy sources, government support for producers","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy efficiency technologies","People":"Fossil fuel producers, investors in the LNG industry","Owner":"Government, fossil fuel companies"},{"Description":"Plummeting production and rig count in the US shale industry","Impact":"Loss of energy dominance, geopolitical consequences","Mitigation":"Investment in renewable energy, diversification of energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, advanced drilling technologies","People":"US shale industry, US government","Owner":"Renewable energy companies, US government"},{"Description":"Potential peak fossil fuel demand and demise of fossil fuels accelerated by Covid-19","Impact":"Disruption of fossil fuel industry, economic impact on fossil fuel incumbents","Mitigation":"Diversification into clean energy sources, financial support for fossil fuel industry","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy efficiency technologies","People":"Fossil fuel companies, renewable energy companies","Owner":"Government, fossil fuel companies"}]}
